mapper.update: update member set birthday = #{birthday}, mobile = #{mobile}, email = #{email}, addrload = #{addrload}, filename = #{filename}, addrdetail = #{addrdetail} where mid = #{mid}
mapper.select: select count(*) totalCnt from member where removeyn = 'n'
mapper.insert: insert into member(mid, email, passwd, name, zipcode, addrload, addrdetail,mobile,filename) values(#{mid}, #{email}, #{passwd}, #{name}, #{zipcode}, #{addrload}, #{addrdetail}, #{mobile}, #{filename})
